flow-definition.description: Bake a managed OS image with the given tomcat installed, and optionally trigger the downstream job to deploy the image to the VMSS.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TOMCAT_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The version of the Tomcat service that will be bundled in the result OS image.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RESOURCE_GROUP
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The resource group to store the managed OS image.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: IMAGE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name of the result managed OS image. If not provided, a random one will be generated with the pattern "tomcat-{TOMCAT_VERSION}-XXXX".

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: TRIGGER_DEPLOY
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Whether to trigger the deployment of the image to the VMSS or not.
